body.p: 1. Abinadab’s son. With his brother Uzzah, Ahio drove the ox cart carrying the ark of the covenant to its new home at Jerusalem (2 Sm 6:3-4; 1 Chr 13:7).
2. Elpaal’s son from Benjamin’s tribe (1 Chr 8:14).
3. Son of Jeiel and his wife Maacah. This Ahio was a brother or an uncle of Kish, Saul’s father (1 Chr 8:31; 9:36-37).
